footer.description: Transforming health management with innovative technology. We simplify medical administration for professionals and patients.

hero.title: Transforming Health.
hero.subtitle1: We promote efficiency in health institutions across Latin America.
hero.subtitle2: Companies of all sizes can manage their complete operations quickly, securely, and flexibly using Zonda's software and API.

mainContent.title: We Transform Healthcare Management with Advanced Technology
mainContent.description1: We develop interoperable digital infrastructures that unify fragmented systems, optimizing workflows and improving care quality.
mainContent.description2: Our comprehensive platform allows healthcare organizations to maximize their operational efficiency and profitability through intelligent integration of existing technologies, without the need to replace previous investments.

healthManagement.title: Comprehensive Healthcare Management
healthManagement.description: Unifies patient administration, medical scheduling, clinical records, and human resources in a centralized solution with advanced analytics and real-time operational control.

professionalPlatform.title: Platform
professionalPlatform.description: Specialized technology for healthcare professionals with assisted diagnostic tools, consultation management, and predictive analysis to optimize clinical practice.

reportsAnalytics.title: Reports and Clinical Analytics
reportsAnalytics.description: Executive dashboard with performance metrics, demand predictive analysis, care quality indicators, and customized reports by unit, professional, and medical specialty.

clinicalAI.title: Clinical Artificial Intelligence
clinicalAI.description: We convert data into key information through AI, helping to make better clinical decisions and optimize medical processes.

interoperability.title: Interoperability
interoperability.description: Our API connects existing systems and facilitates secure, standardized, and efficient exchange of clinical and administrative data, without the need to replace previous investments.

weHelp.title: We help improve your business results and offer patient-centered care.
weHelp.description: We are a team of health technology experts dedicated to improving your business results and offering patient-centered care.

fraudSavings.label: Savings in fraud and inappropriate practices

contact.title: Ready to Transform Your Health Operations?
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team to learn how Zonda Health can help you provide better patient care through innovative technological solutions.

placeholders.message: Tell us about your health technology needs...

form.privacy: I agree with the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service
form.success: Message sent successfully! We will contact you soon.

hero.title: and Data
hero.description: Through the use of artificial intelligence, Zonda interprets large volumes of clinical data and generates insights, alerts, or automatic clinical recommendations. This capability can help identify risk patterns in patients, anticipate or even suggest treatments.

healthProfiles.title: Health Profiles and Intelligent Alerts
healthProfiles.subtitle: We create comprehensive health profiles and alert systems that keep all stakeholders informed

profiles.title: Health Profiles
profiles.description: We build comprehensive health profiles that integrate information from multiple sources to create a unified view of the patient.

patientAlerts.title: Patient Alerts
patientAlerts.description: Intelligent alert system that notifies about changes in patient status, treatments, and necessary follow-ups.

organizationalAlerts.title: Organizational Alerts
organizationalAlerts.description: Organization-level alerts to optimize resources, manage capacity, and improve operational efficiency.

advancedAI.title: Advanced Artificial Intelligence
advancedAI.subtitle: Cutting-edge technology that transforms healthcare through dynamic profiles, intelligent prediction, and continuous monitoring.

dynamicProfiles.title: Dynamic Health Profiles
dynamicProfiles.description: We create unique health profiles for each patient based on their medical records and habits. These profiles are constantly updated.

prediction.title: Prediction and Prevention
prediction.description: Thanks to the analysis of historical and current data, we can anticipate future behaviors and detect early alerts.

surveys.title: Surveys and Monitoring
surveys.description: Through periodic surveys, we collect new information about changes in lifestyle and symptoms.

betterResults.title: Better Results
betterResults.description: The combination of clinical data, habits, and constant monitoring improves diagnostic accuracy and optimizes treatments.

medicalNotes.title: Intelligent Medical Notes
medicalNotes.description: Helps healthcare professionals write their notes flexibly, Zonda understands, improves, and structures medical evolutions to achieve better results later

hero.title: Reports, Metrics and
hero.description: We convert data into useful information for decision-making. Through dashboards and visualization tools, you can access customized reports by region, unit, professional, diagnosis, and treatment.

features.title: Data Visualization Features
features.subtitle: Advanced tools for analysis and visualization of medical information

interactiveDashboards.title: Interactive Dashboards
interactiveDashboards.description: Dynamic visualizations that adapt to your specific analysis needs.

trendAnalysis.title: Trend Analysis
trendAnalysis.description: Automatic identification of patterns and trends in medical data.

realTime.title: Real Time
realTime.description: Real-time updates to keep information always current.

customReports.title: Custom Reports
customReports.description: Automatic generation of custom reports by region, unit, and professional.

advancedVisualizations.title: Advanced Visualizations
advancedVisualizations.description: Charts, tables, and interactive visualizations for better data understanding.

dataExport.title: Data Export
dataExport.description: Export your analyses in multiple formats for sharing and presentation.

patientReports.title: Detailed Patient Reports
patientReports.description: Each patient has a personalized panel with metrics, alerts, and month-to-month evolution. Continuous health monitoring with clear visualizations and automatic trends.

vitalSigns.title: Vital Signs
vitalSigns.description: Automatic monitoring of blood pressure and heart rate

automaticAlerts.title: Automatic Alerts
automaticAlerts.description: Immediate notifications when out-of-range values are detected

temporalEvolution.title: Temporal Evolution
temporalEvolution.description: Chronological visualization of records and procedures

visualTrends.title: Visual Trends
visualTrends.description: Charts and colors that facilitate understanding of evolution

dataIntegration.title: Flexibility in Data Ingestion
dataIntegration.subtitle: No matter how you ingest data into Zonda's engine, whether using our management system or our API directly, we let you choose your own experience.

managementSystem.title: Management System
managementSystem.description: Use our comprehensive management platform to enter data in a structured and organized way.

directAPI.title: Direct API
directAPI.description: Connect your existing systems directly through our robust and flexible API.

instantResults.title: Instant Results
instantResults.description: Get real-time results for any use case you want to integrate.

hero.title: Interoperability
hero.description: Our robust API acts as a bridge to integrate existing data sources. It allows institutions to maintain their own systems (billing, appointments, medical records, etc.) while connecting with Zonda to share and visualize data securely and standardized.

quote.line1: Dedicate time to offering the best service
quote.line2: of health provision, we provide you with
quote.mission: Our mission is to free health institutions from technological complexities so they can focus on what matters most: caring for their patients.

apiIntegration.title: Robust and Flexible API
apiIntegration.subtitle: The result? We facilitate fluid information exchange between organizations or within complex structures such as hospital networks.

existingSystems.title: Integration with Existing Systems
existingSystems.description: Connect billing, scheduling, medical records, and other existing systems without interrupting operations.

security.title: Security and Standardization
security.description: Share and visualize data securely and standardized while maintaining the integrity and privacy of information.

flexibility.title: Extreme Flexibility
flexibility.description: Extremely flexible and adaptable API that adjusts to the specific needs of each institution.

fluidExchange.title: Fluid Exchange
fluidExchange.description: Fluid information exchange between organizations and within complex structures such as hospital networks.

systemMaintenance.title: System Maintenance
systemMaintenance.description: Maintenance of own systems while connecting with Zonda, without interruptions in daily operations.

instantResults.title: Instant Results
instantResults.description: Get real-time results for any use case you want to integrate with our robust API.

hero.title: Management
hero.description: We offer a comprehensive digital management platform for health institutions that allows centralizing key operations such as patient administration, appointments, treatments, and professionals.

features.title: Platform Features
features.subtitle: Complete tools for comprehensive management of health institutions

patientManagement.title: Patient Management
patientManagement.description: Centralized administration of medical records, personal data, and treatment follow-up.

appointmentManagement.title: Appointment Management
appointmentManagement.description: Complete scheduling and management system for medical appointments with professionals.

treatmentManagement.title: Treatment Management
treatmentManagement.description: Detailed follow-up of medical treatments and patient evolution.

professionalManagement.title: Professional Management
professionalManagement.description: Administration of medical staff and assignment of roles and permissions.

reportsAnalytics.title: Reports and Analytics
reportsAnalytics.description: Generation of reports and data analysis for decision-making.

securityCompliance.title: Security and Compliance
securityCompliance.description: Compliance with health regulations and protection of sensitive data.

hero.title: Professional
hero.description: Specialized tools for healthcare professionals that allow them to interact with their patients' data and optimize their medical practice

medicalHistory.title: Complete Medical History
medicalHistory.description: Complete access to patients' medical history from multiple institutions.

consultationRecords.title: Consultation Records
consultationRecords.description: Efficient and detailed recording of medical consultations and treatments.

digitalPrescription.title: Digital Prescription
digitalPrescription.description: Integrated digital prescription system for medications.

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis
dataAnalysis.description: Detailed analysis of patient status by visit and evolution.

multiInstitutional.title: Multi-Institutional
multiInstitutional.description: Work with multiple health institutions from a single platform.

mobileAccess.title: Mobile Access
mobileAccess.description: Mobile application optimized for access from any device.

platformSection.title: Professional Platform
platformSection.subtitle: Specialized tools for healthcare professionals that allow them to interact with their patients' data and optimize their medical practice.

medicalHistory.title: Medical History
medicalHistory.description: Complete access to patients' medical history from multiple institutions

consultationRecords.title: Consultation Records
consultationRecords.description: Efficient and detailed recording of medical consultations and treatments

digitalPrescription.title: Digital Prescription
digitalPrescription.description: Integrated digital prescription system for medications

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis
dataAnalysis.description: Detailed analysis of patient status by visit and evolution

hero.title: Electronic Health
hero.description: Zonda provides flexible Electronic Health Records capability that can be coupled or decoupled from scheduling systems. Each new record automatically updates the patient's health profile, enabling early alerts for health changes.

features.title: EHR Capabilities
features.subtitle: Flexible and intelligent electronic health record management

flexibleCoupling.title: Flexible System Integration
flexibleCoupling.description: EHR capability that can be coupled or decoupled from scheduling systems, adapting to your operational needs.

autoProfileUpdate.title: Automatic Profile Updates
autoProfileUpdate.description: Each new record automatically updates the patient's health profile (monthly, annual, lifetime), enabling early alerts for health changes.

completeHistory.title: Complete Patient History
completeHistory.description: Professionals always have access to a complete, summarized view of the patient's history — clear, concise, and never losing details.

unstructuredInput.title: Natural Input Processing
unstructuredInput.description: Zonda does not require structured input — medical professionals can add notes in any format, and Zonda understands, structures, and records them automatically.

earlyAlerts.title: Early Health Alerts
earlyAlerts.description: Intelligent monitoring that detects patterns and changes in patient health, providing timely alerts for proactive care.

seamlessWorkflow.title: Seamless Workflow
seamlessWorkflow.description: Streamlined documentation process that enhances rather than hinders clinical workflow and decision-making.

intelligentProcessing.title: Intelligent Medical Documentation
intelligentProcessing.subtitle: Advanced AI-powered processing that understands and structures medical information naturally

naturalLanguage.title: Natural Language Understanding
naturalLanguage.description: Process medical notes in any format using advanced AI that understands context and medical terminology.

automaticStructuring.title: Automatic Structuring
automaticStructuring.description: Transform unstructured medical notes into organized, searchable records without manual formatting.

contextualAnalysis.title: Contextual Analysis
contextualAnalysis.description: Analyze medical information in context, identifying relationships and patterns for better clinical insights.

continuousLearning.title: Continuous Learning
continuousLearning.description: System improves over time, learning from patterns and adapting to your specific medical practice and terminology.

hero.title: Integrated Patient
hero.description: Zonda verifies patient identity and provides a comprehensive patient experience platform. Patients receive summarized clinical history for confirmation, appointment reminders, and regular health surveys that enrich their profile with AI-processed insights.

features.title: Patient Experience Features
features.subtitle: Comprehensive patient engagement and data verification platform

identityVerification.title: Identity Verification
identityVerification.description: Secure patient identity verification process that ensures accurate data and builds trust in the healthcare relationship.

clinicalHistoryConfirmation.title: Clinical History Confirmation
clinicalHistoryConfirmation.description: Patients receive a summarized version of their clinical history for confirmation, ensuring accurate and trusted data.

appointmentReminders.title: Appointment Reminders
appointmentReminders.description: Optional reminders and notifications for appointments, professional visits, and confirmations to reduce missed appointments.

healthSurveys.title: Health Surveys
healthSurveys.description: Regular surveys sent to patients about their experience, lifestyle, and health — Zonda processes responses and extracts key insights.

profileEnrichment.title: Profile Enrichment
profileEnrichment.description: AI processes survey responses to extract insights (family history, habits, risks) and enriches the patient profile for professionals.

patientEngagement.title: Patient Engagement
patientEngagement.description: Active patient participation in their healthcare journey through accessible tools and meaningful interactions.

aiInsights.title: AI-Powered Patient Insights
aiInsights.subtitle: Transform patient feedback into actionable clinical intelligence

surveyProcessing.title: Intelligent Survey Processing
surveyProcessing.description: AI analyzes patient responses to identify patterns, risks, and opportunities for improved care.

lifestyleTracking.title: Lifestyle Tracking
lifestyleTracking.description: Monitor changes in patient lifestyle, habits, and health patterns through regular engagement.

riskIdentification.title: Risk Identification
riskIdentification.description: Early identification of health risks and family history patterns through comprehensive patient data analysis.

personalizedCare.title: Personalized Care Planning
personalizedCare.description: Generate personalized care recommendations based on patient history, lifestyle, and survey insights.

hero.title: Multi-Organization
hero.description: Zonda is designed for large organizations with multiple sub-organizations. The main organization can manage all sub-entities through Zonda's API integration, whether they use Zonda or external systems, with scalable and interoperable architecture.

features.title: Multi-Organization Capabilities
features.subtitle: Scalable architecture for complex organizational structures

largeOrganizationSupport.title: Large Organization Support
largeOrganizationSupport.description: Designed for large organizations with multiple sub-organizations (insurers, hospitals, home-care systems).

unifiedManagement.title: Unified Management
unifiedManagement.description: Main organization can manage all sub-entities, whether they use Zonda or external systems, via API integration.

crossOrganizationAssignment.title: Cross-Organization Assignment
crossOrganizationAssignment.description: Assign patients, professionals, and treatments across sub-organizations with flexible access management.

independentAccess.title: Independent Access Management
independentAccess.description: Manage access independently for each sub-organization while maintaining centralized oversight and control.

localGlobalReports.title: Local and Global Reports
localGlobalReports.description: Generate both local reports for individual sub-organizations and global reports for the entire organization.

scalableArchitecture.title: Scalable Architecture
scalableArchitecture.description: Architecture that adapts to any operational model with unlimited scalability and interoperability.

integrationFlexibility.title: Integration Flexibility
integrationFlexibility.subtitle: Adaptable to any operational model with seamless integration capabilities

apiIntegration.title: Robust API Integration
apiIntegration.description: Connect with existing systems through Zonda's comprehensive API, maintaining operational continuity.

hybridDeployment.title: Hybrid Deployment
hybridDeployment.description: Support for mixed environments where some sub-organizations use Zonda while others maintain external systems.

operationalContinuity.title: Operational Continuity
operationalContinuity.description: Seamless integration without disrupting existing operations or requiring system replacements.

customWorkflows.title: Custom Workflows
customWorkflows.description: Adapt to unique organizational workflows and processes while maintaining data consistency and security.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
